name: The Inner Workings of Tetris
description:
Have you ever wondered what lies on the opposite side of the game screen? Well, it's a fact that behind every game of Tetris, there's a tiny pixie choosing which pieces to send to which players. Usually, these pixies are benevolent, trying to give players exactly what they need. Today..... you are that pixie.

Instructions

-Click and drag pieces to send them to each player

-The players will try and decide the best place to put the pieces themselves

-Try and help all players get the best score they can! If one loses, they all lose!



More:

-Each player can only drop one piece at a time

-The same piece cannot be sent to the same player twice in a row

-If a player does not receive a piece, they will be given garbage lines

-Where is this going in the future?  Well, it could be local coop with real players. But, that will be left to a post jam version

By: @NeuroDiversion // @BeanBorg

Can you beat my best scores of 4200 and 3400?
